Factsheet

Developer:
Flat Pixel
Based in Paris, France
Publisher, Product owner:
Nickelodeon
Based in New York City, United States
Release date:
3 March, 2018
Platforms:
iOS
Website:
Regular Price:
Free

Description

Do Not Touch is a breakthrough immersive experience bringing the world of Nickelodeon right into you living room! Get a new unexpected surprise every time you push the button! Help SpongeBob catch jellyfish, become an artist by painting all over your space or discover hidden messages when you switch off the lights!

History

The first steps of DNT

Do Not Touch was originally a prototype conceived by Flat Pixel's co-founders and Nickelodeon in late 2017. With the ARKit technology and a lot of creativity this little prototype evolved to its release on the App Store in March 2018.

.. leading to its release

In the first version of DNT, the concept was really simple : just place the button on a flat surface and press it, then .. something happens. The risk paid off and the Kids loved it! Do Not Touch 1.0 even won Flat Pixel its first Clio Entertainment Award for the category Virtual/Augmented Reality in 2018.

Do Not Touch 2.0

A year later, Do Not Touch got an upgrade. A collection system and a simple economy were added that rewarded users with slime points that they could spend to unlock new mini-games and wacky button skins. A second Clio Entertainment in Virtual/Augmented Reality soon followed in 2019!

Features

  • AR sandbox of more than 60 animations and mini-games
  • Delightful skins to unlock on the Do Not Touch button
  • Colorful 3D art by Marcin JP.
  • Punchy SFX by Gabriel D.

About Flat Pixel

Boilerplate
Flat Pixel is a Paris based game studio composed of artists and engineers dedicated to unique visual experiences and cutting edge technology. Specialized in augmented reality games since 2012.
